## Description {#details}

A pass for printing the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> for a function.

This pass doesn&#39;t print whatever information the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> happens to hold, but instead first uses the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phivalues">PhiValues</a> to analyze all the phis in the function so the complete information is printed.

Definition at line 129 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/phivalues-h">PhiValues.h</a>.
